name: searchengine-devtools
description: A tool to help test search engine configuration changes

scripts.build: npm-run-all clean build:installdiff build:createvalidate build:extension build:finalize
scripts.build:createvalidate: ajv compile --verbose --all-errors -s schemas/search-engine-config-schema.json -o validate.js && webpack && rm validate.js
scripts.start: cp node_modules/diff/dist/diff.js extension/content/ && web-ext run --source-dir ./extension/ -p dev -f /Users/mark/dev/gecko/objdir-ff-opt/dist/Nightly.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox
